We take your privacy extremely seriously, and we will never share or sell your personal information.
Screen Replacement

Accidents are part of life. If your screen is cracked or broken, we will replace it quickly and with no trouble.

Camera Replacement

Phone cameras can take a beating. We will repair cracked or broken lenses and replace any other parts necessary.

Battery Replacement

Sometime the battery starts to lose charge and you need a replacement. We will provide the right battery at the right price.

Water Damage Check

Liquids can be disastrous to phones but don't worry, we are on the case. We'll get your device up and running again.

Charge Port Replacement

Your phone's charge port get the most wear and tear and will sometimes require replacement. Call us.

Device Diagnostic

Let us give your phone a full health check. Our tests will show up any faults and then… we fix them.

Gadget Medics: At your iPhone repair Service

We provide iPhone repair services to the customers located in Boca Raton, Parkland, Coconut Creek and Delray Beach FL. We know how hard is it to see your iPhone in a state of non-working and so we are here to help you with our iPhone repair services at a very reasonable rate and duration.

We are certified professionals, here at gadget medics promise to deliver iphone repair services in Boca Raton, Parkland, Coconut  and Delray Beach Florida Location. We know how heartbroken it turns out to be when your tech products get damaged. Now, you don’t need to worry about it at all. Be it a broken screen, product malfunction or dead battery life, we are here to fix it all for you. We are just a call away. You can call us anytime and from anywhere. We are always up for the services. There is no time warranty when you take your gadgets to a nearest local store but here at gadget medics your gadgets gets repaired within a suitable time period which keeps it easy for you to handle.

  1. iPhone display replacement- The most basic damage of an iPhone user turns out to be screen damage. If your iPhone display isn’t working we are here to help you out with it.
  1. Poor battery life- If your iPhone isn’t working with good battery life and its battery drains early unlike others. So it surely needs a battery replacement which can be easily done at gadget medics.
  1. iPhone camera replacement- We can replace your camera lenses and other parts for a better camera vision.
  1. Water-Resistant- If your iPhone lacks water resistance, we can add on to this feature to your iPhone so that water damage cannot take place again.
  1. iPhone charger cord replacement- If your iPhone is not charging so there must be a charger port replacement.
  1. Anti-theft- If your iPhone is not in a state of smooth working, maybe the virus has invaded your smartphone. We can help you out with it by providing anti-virus software that keeps your iPhone away from data damage and threat.
  1. iPhone back replacement- If the back panel of your iPhone is broken, it can be easily mended by us.
  1. iPhone software updates- If your iPhone is dealing with software issues, we can get it fixed.
  1. Power button- If your iPhone power button isn’t working, we can help you out with it.
  1. Heat resistant- If your iPhone gets heated up early, this must be the product malfunction. We can fix it for you easily so that your iPhone never gets heated easily.
  1. Microphone malfunction- If you are not able to hear the sound of your loved ones when you call, it must be a microphone malware which can easily be fixed and saved from further damage.
